footer.aboutDesc: Foundation dedicated to education in technology, computational thinking and social innovation in vulnerable communities in Colombia.

about.title: Learn about us
about.subtitle: We transform lives through education
about.description: The Samval Foundation is a non-profit entity whose philosophical foundation is the strengthening of human dignity, the conservation of planet Earth, and the encouragement of prosperity as a fundamental basis for social advancement, using education, science and innovation for this purpose. Education being the pillar of PEACE, so that social groups or territories achieve articulation between the various actors involved in daily life: governments, academia, and business.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To contribute to the promotion of education as the fundamental basis of society, using computational thinking, science, innovation and peace.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be recognized as a leading institution in strengthening education, the pillar of PEACE so that nations achieve articulation between the various actors involved in society: governments, academia, and businesses.

service1.title: Closing the digital skills gap
service1.description: Samval focuses on bringing essential digital skills, such as computational thinking and robotics, to marginalized communities, including ethnic groups, thereby closing the digital divide and providing equal opportunities.

service2.title: Training for the Digital Economy
service2.description: By preparing young people in high-demand technology areas, Samval contributes to building the human capital needed to drive Colombia's digital economy, reducing the shortage of technology professionals.

service3.title: Science and Technology
service3.description: Digital talent development fosters entrepreneurship, job creation in the technology sector and attracts investment, contributing to the country's sustainable economic growth.

service4.title: Cognitive Skills Development
service4.description: Computational thinking strengthens crucial skills such as critical thinking and problem-solving, preparing students for the challenges of an ever-changing world.

service5.title: Cultural adaptation
service5.description: The foundation takes into account the indigenous worldview and implements it in the way of educating, respecting native languages.

service6.title: Preparation for the Digital Society
service6.description: Samval prepares new generations to actively participate in the digital transformation, ensuring that Colombia does not fall behind.

post1.title: What is Thymio
post1.description: Thymio is an educational robot designed to teach programming and robotics skills to students of all ages.

post2.title: Global Impact
post2.description: Thymio is transforming education in countries around the world by promoting STEM learning and closing the digital divide.

post3.title: Success Stories
post3.description: Discover how Thymio has been implemented in schools and communities to foster critical thinking and creativity.

event1.title: Arahuacos
event1.description: The Arahuacos have a worldview based on harmony with nature and ancestral knowledge. Teaching computational thinking through mobile robots will be integrated with their cosmovision without imposing Western paradigms and in their native language.

event2.title: Teacher Training in Computational Thinking
event2.description: Ma kankamana community council of San Basilio de Palenque, cultural identity and language (Palenquero) will be strengthened as the programming language will be adapted to the native language which plays a key role in education. Strategies will be designed that respect and strengthen their cultural heritage.
